    • Class tetrisgame.TetrisPanel

      class TetrisPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currTetro
          Tetromino currTetro
          The currently active Tetromino being controlled by the player.
        • gameOn
          boolean gameOn
          Flag indicating whether the game is currently active.
        • nextTetro
          Tetromino nextTetro
          The next Tetromino that will appear on the board.
        • score
          int score
          The player's current score in the game.
        • squareHeight
          int squareHeight
          The height of the Tetris board in terms of the number of squares.
        • Squares
          TetrisSquare[][] Squares
          A 2D array of squares representing the Tetris game board.
        • squareWidth
          int squareWidth
          The width of the Tetris board in terms of the number of squares.

    • Class tetrisgame.Tetromino

      class Tetromino extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • active
          boolean active
          Boolean flag storing whether the Tetro is currently acitve in a Game instance
        • color
          Color color
          The Color of the Tetromino
        • height
          int height
          The height of the Tetromino in squares
        • lWidth
          int lWidth
          The leftward width of the Tetro relative to its origin in squares
        • rWidth
          int rWidth
          The rightward widht of the Tetro relative ot its origin in squares
        • shape
          TetroShape shape
          The shape of the Tetromino
        • squares
          ArrayList<TetrisSquare> squares
          The ArrayList of TetrisSquare occupied by the Tetromino
        • topleft
          Coord topleft
          The grid coordinates of the origin of the Tetromino
        • TP
          TetrisPanel TP
          The Tetris game the Tetromino is in
